NPC_data module

author

Sascha Bäuerle

name

language.py

created

  1. Mai 2022

description

Contains class NPC_data

class NPC_data.NPC_data(db_path, language)

Bases: object

Interface for all datas for NPC like position dialogs and sprites storaged in database

Parameters

  • db_path (string) – path to the database

  • language (string) – language of the dialog in the database

languageflag

String: True if language not as DB available otherwise false

npc_db

sqlite3.connect.cursor: Cursor to DB connection

trans

Language: Object of Translation class

__check(language)

check if language is available as database

Parameters

language (string) – actuall language

Returns

true if language is available as database

Return type

bool

__insert_NPC(NPC_ID, sprite_link, position_x, position_y)

Create new in database

Parameters

  • NPC_ID (int) – ID of the NPC

  • sprite_link (pygame.sprite) – sprite link (just needed if it moving)

  • position_x (int) – x position on map

  • position_y (int) – y position on map

close()

close the database connection

get_dialog(NPC_ID, dialog_number)

Dialogs of NPC

Parameters

  • NPC_ID (int) – ID of the NPC

  • dialog_number (int) – Number of the dialog from the NPC

Returns

Dialog of the NPC

Return type

tuple

get_dialog_length(NPCID)

Number of dialogs of the NPC

Returns

Number of dialogs of the NPC or “fail” if no found

Return type

int

get_position(NPC_ID)

position of the NPC from the NPC ID

Parameters

NPC_ID (int) – ID of the NPC

Returns

position of the NPC

Return type

tuple
